title: Meet with Employers
text: Prepare and have required papers ready.

title: Pick up Kids
text: Communicate with school about pick-up times.

title: Get groceries for Dinner.
text: Make a prep list of ingredients and rough estimate of time.

title: Call with Finanical Advisor
text: Have financial records and pen and paper ready.

title: Family get-together
text: Find out what food is being made so you can bring something to contribute.
